name: Elk Mountain AutoDrive
description:
93 Waypoints covering Fields, Farms, Productions and Fill and Sell Points. There is a small, basic course set up for automating the mine production.

NB. The Seed/Fert/Lime Fill point is in an extremely awkward position so that can only be used as a 'send to' point and then manoeuvre yourself from there.

NB. The Animal Dealer (We Buy Hay) sell point can't unload automatically. Will need to send and then unload manually.

Please let me know if you find anything wrong or doesn't work and I will try and get a fix done and new version uploaded.

Please use the comments section or you can find me on Discord @ https://discord.gg/aQNvR5G6
